entry.name: .add
entry.description: Construct a new instance from the current instance's elements and the provided elements

argument.name: elems
argument.description: The element(s) to combine with the current elements forming the new instance. Can be any of the following: - Node - zQuery instance - Selector to query for elements in the whole document - Array-like object of elements

returns.return: A new zQuery instance containing the superset elements
